DataElement.preferredName: Health Utilities Index During Past Week Ability to Perform Basic Activities Status
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Response about a subject's ability, during the past week, to perform basic activities.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Health Utilities Index During Past Week Ability to Perform Basic Activities
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A family of generic health profiles and preference-based systems for measuring health status, reporting health-related quality of life, and producing utility scores._At some point in a given period of time._The most recent week. May include the present day._A question about an individual's ability to perform basic activities.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A family of generic health profiles and preference-based systems for measuring health status, reporting health-related quality of life, and producing utility scores.

Concepts.definition: A family of generic health profiles and preference-based systems for measuring health status, reporting health-related quality of life, and producing utility scores.

Property.preferredName: During Past Week Ability to Perform Basic Activities
Property.preferredDefinition: At some point in a given period of time.:The most recent week. May include the present day.:A question about an individual's ability to perform basic activities.

Concepts.definition: At some point in a given period of time.
The most recent week. May include the present day.
A question about an individual's ability to perform basic activities.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredName: Health Utilities Index Basic Activities Status
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Status of an individual's ability to perform basic activities.

PermissibleValues.value: Required the help of another person to eat, bathe, dress or use the toilet
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Required Help to Eat, Bathe, Dress, or Use Toilet

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Required Help to Eat, Bathe, Dress, or Use Toilet
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual required help from another person to eat, bathe, dress, or use the toilet.

Concepts.longName: Required Help to Eat, Bathe, Dress, or Use Toilet
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual required help from another person to eat, bathe, dress, or use the toilet.

PermissibleValues.value: Required mechanical equipment to eat, bathe, dress or use the toilet independently
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Required Mechanical Equipment to Eat, Bathe, Dress, or Use Toilet Independently

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Required Mechanical Equipment to Eat, Bathe, Dress, or Use Toilet Independently
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or was able to eat, bathe, dress, and use the toilet independently, but required mechanical equipment.

Concepts.longName: Required Mechanical Equipment to Eat, Bathe, Dress, or Use Toilet Independently
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or was able to eat, bathe, dress, and use the toilet independently, but required mechanical equipment.

PermissibleValues.value: Eat, bathe, dress or use the toilet independently with difficulty
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Eat, Bathe, Dress, and Use Toilet with Difficulty

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Eat, Bathe, Dress, and Use Toilet with Difficulty
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or was able to eat, bathe, dress, and use the toilet independently, but with difficulty.

Concepts.longName: Eat, Bathe, Dress, and Use Toilet with Difficulty
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or was able to eat, bathe, dress, and use the toilet independently, but with difficulty.

PermissibleValues.value: Eat, bathe, dress and use the toilet normally
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Eat, Bathe, Dress, and Use Toilet Normally

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Eat, Bathe, Dress, and Use Toilet Normally
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or was able to eat, bathe, dress, and use the toilet normally.

Concepts.longName: Eat, Bathe, Dress, and Use Toilet Normally
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or was able to eat, bathe, dress, and use the toilet normally.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A condition or state at a particular time.

Concepts.definition: A condition or state at a particular time.

ValueDomain.origin: HUI:Health Utilities Index; Feeny et al., Health Utilities Index Chapter 26 In Bert Spilker, ed. Quality of Life and Pharmacoeconomics in Clinical Trials. Second Edition. Philadelphia: Lippincott-Raven Press, 1996, pp 239-252.
